sentences.sContent: About the origin of the Mid Autumn Festival is not a.
sentences.sContent_eng: About the origin of the Mid Autumn Festival is not a.
sentences.sCn: 有关中秋节的由来众说不一。

sentences.sContent: According to astronomy, the Mid Autumn Festival occurs at the autumn equinox.
sentences.sContent_eng: According to astronomy, the Mid Autumn Festival occurs at the autumn equinox.
sentences.sCn: 根据天文学，中秋节是秋分之时。

sentences.sContent: This was known as autumn reward. Since the 15'" month of the 8th month is the time when rice paddies are harvested, some people believe that the Mid Autumn Festival came from the autumn reward ritual.
sentences.sContent_eng: This was known as autumn reward. Since the 15'" month of the 8th month is the time when rice paddies are harvested, some people believe that the Mid Autumn Festival came from the autumn reward ritual.
sentences.sCn: 到了秋天，人们会再次祭祀土地之神，感谢他给予人们丰收，这就是著名的秋日祭祀，因为阴历8月15日是水稻成熟之时，所以有些人认为中秋节是从秋日祭祀仪式演变而来的。
